review: Received the fire stick almost two weeks after ordering.  We have trouble maintaining a good connection with the internet even though we have wireless and the fire stick is close to the modem. It also lists many good programs that are available but cannot receive them unless we purchase more through our cable provider.  If I had to do it all over again, I would not purchase.
